channel.title: Notable Artists Born Today
channel.description: RSS feed of notable writers, poets, directors, and actors born on this day in history.

item.title: Kevin Brown (actor)
item.description: Kevin Brown (born 1974) is an American comedian and film and television actor, best known for his role on the series 30 Rock as "Dot Com". Brown also appeared as the lead in Marq Overton's one-man play Die Laughing in 2008 at the Diversity Players of Harlem and as an actor and executive producer of the stage play Box (an off-Broadway play about four Haitian stowaways to America). He co-founded Uptown Comedy Club.
